Winner, winner, Chicken Tortilla Soup dinner! Tender chicken thighs, creamy pinto beans, garlic and onions, crushed tomatoes, jalapeño pepper, crushed tomatoes, and ALL the toppings. The post Chicken Tortilla Soup appeared first on Pinch of Yum.

column1: Sopa Tarasca (Pinto Bean Soup) with Jalapeño Corn Fritters
column3: Let's make Sopa Tarasca! It's a creamy, silky Mexican-inspired soup made with pinto beans, warm chili spices, and whole tomatoes. And you NEED a big pile of the jalapeño corn fritters on top. Drooling over this one! The post Sopa Tarasca (Pinto Bean Soup) with Jalapeño Corn Fritters appeared first on Pinch of Yum.

Corn Casserole all zazzed up! Bursty bites of cream-style corn and sweet corn plus garlic, bacon, and cheese throughout - so you know it's really, really good! The post Really Good Corn Casserole appeared first on Pinch of Yum.

column1: Pumpkin Shortcakes with Cinnamon Apples and Maple Whipped Cream Cheese
column3: Pumpkin Biscuits with Cinnamon Apples for you! Warm and gooey cinnamon brown sugar apples piled between fluffy pumpkin biscuits that YOU made. Pile on the creamy twists of whipped maple cream cheese and yes, this is exactly the over-the-top brunch/dessert/snack you need. The post Pumpkin Shortcakes with Cinnamon Apples and Maple Whipped Cream Cheese appeared first on Pinch of Yum.
